v8:item.v8:content: Kit orders to warehouse or production orders to division production

Order - source of demand that frames production order
Date and time of early begin of the execution
Date and time of late end of the execution
ProductsAndServices that needs to be assembled
Number reserved in the warehouse on order
Products and services unit of measurement
Warehouse where materials and parts can be reserved in accordance with the customer order
Cancellation of order having the Application or IN progress status
Products And Services list. Used to reflect in the documents list.
List of resources. Used to reflect in the documents list.
List of inventories which is necessary to assembly (Assembly operation type) or to disassembly (Disassembly operation type)

Number reserved in the warehouse on order
Products and services unit of measurement
Specification of the items production (Assembly operation type) or disassembly (Disassembly operation type)
List of inventories required for the production output (Assembly operation type) or the disassembly result (Disassembly operation type)
Reserve required for the production output (Assembly operation type) or the disassembly result (Disassembly operation type)
Products and services unit of measurement

Enterprise resource whose load is to be scheduled
Assignment duration in the format HH: MM
